content: उद्वहनं {@--1@} Marrying. {@--2@} Supporting, holding or lifting up, bearing, carrying; भुवः प्रयुक्तोद्वहनक्रियायाः <ls>R. 13. 8</ls>; कैलासनाथोद्वहनाय भूयः <ls n="R.">14. 20</ls>; <ls>Māl. 10</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 18</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Being carried on, riding; खरेणोद्वहनं तथा <ls>Ms. 8. 370.</ls> {@--4@} Possessing, having; लज्जा°, विनय° &c.
